class  bduLog
 The bduLog class manages the Boston Dynamics log system. More...

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum
 

Enumeration of log types supported by bduLog.

Enumeration values:
BDU_LOG_TYPE_STDOUT  Send output to stdout.
BDU_LOG_TYPE_STDERR  Send output to stderr.
BDU_LOG_TYPE_FILE  Send output to file.
BDU_LOG_TYPE_CALLBACK  Send output to provided callback function.

anonymous enum
 

Enumeration of log levels supported by bduLog.

Enumeration values:
BDU_LOG_LEVEL_FATAL  Message indicates a fatal condition.
BDU_LOG_LEVEL_ERROR  Message indicates something is seriously wrong.
BDU_LOG_LEVEL_WARN  Message indicates of potential concern happened.
BDU_LOG_LEVEL_INFO  Message is for information purposed.
BDU_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG  Message is for debugging info.

Function Documentation

void bdu_log_print (  int  log_level,
const char *  string
) 
 

Log print function.

Description:
This function prints the passed string to *all* open logs. All logs that print at least the given log_level will print the string.

Parameters:
[in] log_level - level of message
[in] string - message to print

void bdu_log_printf (  int  log_level,
const char *  format,
  ...
) 
 

Log printf function.

Description:
This function prints the passed string to *all* open logs. All logs that print at least the given log_level will print the string.

This function can be used essentially like fprintf().

Parameters:
[in] log_level - level of message
[in] format - printf-style format string
[in] ... - varargs for format
